ygData.subject: Re: Bard letter to GZ
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Heh. Someone who agrees with me that the dance looks silly. I think we should instead add a request for a brass instrument that doesn t have an animation
ygData.messageBody:
On Sun, Sep 26/99, Renee Cole <nat_ive@...> wrote:
> From: "Renee Cole" <nat_ive@...>
>
> >From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>
> >
> >Another broken skill to add, female bards do not dance. I have read on
> >several other bard list that they are very upset by this (atleast some of
> >them are).
>
> Female bards don't dance? Sure we do. If you mean when playing the flute...
> This is why I have a mino horn, not a flute, because of that silly
> marching/dance thingie.

Heh. Someone who agrees with me that the dance looks silly. I think we
should instead add a request for a brass instrument that doesn't have
an animation to go with the mino horn for wind.
